mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_ACHIEVEMENT ( ID, ACHIEVEMENT_NAME, ACHIEVEMENT_SCHEDULE_CATEGORY, ACHIEVEMENT_IMG_PATH, ACHIEVEMENT_IMG_NAME, ACHIEVEMENT_MISSION_COUNT, ACHIEVEMENT_GET_POINT ) VALUES ( SEQ_ACHIEVEMENT.NEXTVAL, #{achievementName}, #{achievementScheduleCategory}, #{acheivementImgPath}, #{achievementImgName}, #{achievementMissonCount}, #{achievementGetPoint} )
INSERT INTO TBL_MEMBER_ACHIEVEMENT(ID, MEMBER_ACHIEVEMENT_DISPLAY , MEMBER_ID, ACHIEVEMENT_COMPLETE_ID) VALUES (SEQ_MEMBER_ACHIEVEMENT.NEXTVAL, DEFAULT, #{memberId}, #{achievementCompleteId})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, ACHIEVEMENT_NAME, ACHIEVEMENT_SCHEDULE_CATEGORY, ACHIEVEMENT_MISSION_COUNT, ACHIEVEMENT_IMG_PATH, ACHIEVEMENT_IMG_PATH, ACHIEVEMENT_IMG_NAME, ACHIEVEMENT_GET_POINT FROM TBL_ACHIEVEMENT WHERE ID = #{id}
SELECT ID, ACHIEVEMENT_NAME, ACHIEVEMENT_SCHEDULE_CATEGORY, ACHIEVEMENT_MISSION_COUNT, ACHIEVEMENT_IMG_PATH, ACHIEVEMENT_IMG_PATH, ACHIEVEMENT_IMG_NAME, ACHIEVEMENT_GET_POINT FROM TBL_ACHIEVEMENT

SELECT TA.ID AS ID, TAC.ID AS ACHIEVEMENT_COMPLETE_ID, TMA.ID AS MEMBER_ACHIEVEMENT_ID, TA.ACHIEVEMENT_NAME AS ACHIEVEMENT_NAME, TA.ACHIEVEMENT_SCHEDULE_CATEGORY AS ACHIEVEMENT_SCHEDULE_CATEGORY, TA.ACHIEVEMENT_IMG_PATH AS ACHIEVEMENT_IMG_PATH, TA.ACHIEVEMENT_IMG_NAME AS ACHIEVEMENT_IMG_NAME, TA.ACHIEVEMENT_GET_POINT AS ACHIEVEMENT_GET_POINT, TA.ACHIEVEMENT_MISSION_COUNT AS ACHIEVEMENT_MISSION_COUNT, TAC.ACHIEVEMENT_CURRENT_MISSION_COUNT AS ACHIEVEMENT_CURRENT_MISSION_COUNT, CASE WHEN ACHIEVEMENT_MISSION_COUNT = ACHIEVEMENT_CURRENT_MISSION_COUNT THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS ACHIEVEMENT_COMPLETED, TMA.MEMBER_ACHIEVEMENT_DISPLAY AS MEMBER_ACHIEVEMENT_DISPLAY FROM TBL_ACHIEVEMENT TA JOIN TBL_ACHIEVEMENT_COMPLETE TAC ON TA.ID = TAC.ACHIEVEMENT_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_MEMBER_ACHIEVEMENT TMA ON TAC.ID = TMA.ACHIEVEMENT_COMPLETE_ID AND TAC.MEMBER_ID = TMA.MEMBER_ID WHERE TAC.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY ACHIEVEMENT_COMPLETED DESC, TMA.MEMBER_ACHIEVEMENT_DISPLAY DESC

SELECT TA.ID AS ID, TAC.ID AS ACHIEVEMENT_COMPLETE_ID, TA.ACHIEVEMENT_NAME AS ACHIEVEMENT_NAME, TA.ACHIEVEMENT_SCHEDULE_CATEGORY AS ACHIEVEMENT_SCHEDULE_CATEGORY, TA.ACHIEVEMENT_IMG_PATH AS ACHIEVEMENT_IMG_PATH, TA.ACHIEVEMENT_IMG_NAME AS ACHIEVEMENT_IMG_NAME, TA.ACHIEVEMENT_GET_POINT AS ACHIEVEMENT_GET_POINT, TA.ACHIEVEMENT_MISSION_COUNT AS ACHIEVEMENT_MISSION_COUNT, TAC.ACHIEVEMENT_CURRENT_MISSION_COUNT AS ACHIEVEMENT_CURRENT_MISSION_COUNT FROM TBL_ACHIEVEMENT TA JOIN TBL_ACHIEVEMENT_COMPLETE TAC ON TA.ID = TAC.ACHIEVEMENT_ID WHERE TAC.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND TA.ACHIEVEMENT_MISSION_COUNT = TAC.ACHIEVEMENT_CURRENT_MISSION_COUNT

SELECT TA.ID AS ID, TAC.ID AS ACHIEVEMENT_COMPLETE_ID, TMA.ID AS MEMBER_ACHIEVEMENT_ID, TA.ACHIEVEMENT_SCHEDULE_CATEGORY AS ACHIEVEMENT_SCHEDULE_CATEGORY, TA.ACHIEVEMENT_IMG_PATH AS ACHIEVEMENT_IMG_PATH, TA.ACHIEVEMENT_IMG_NAME AS ACHIEVEMENT_IMG_NAME, TA.ACHIEVEMENT_GET_POINT AS ACHIEVEMENT_GET_POINT, TA.ACHIEVEMENT_MISSION_COUNT AS ACHIEVEMENT_MISSION_COUNT, TAC.ACHIEVEMENT_CURRENT_MISSION_COUNT AS ACHIEVEMENT_CURRENT_MISSION_COUNT, TMA.MEMBER_ACHIEVEMENT_DISPLAY AS MEMBER_ACHIEVEMENT_DISPLAY FROM TBL_ACHIEVEMENT TA JOIN TBL_ACHIEVEMENT_COMPLETE TAC ON TA.ID = TAC.ACHIEVEMENT_ID JOIN TBL_MEMBER_ACHIEVEMENT TMA ON TAC.ID = TMA.ACHIEVEMENT_COMPLETE_ID WHERE TMA.MEMBER_ID = #{id} ORDER BY TMA.MEMBER_ACHIEVEMENT_DISPLAY DESC

SELECT TA.ID AS ID, TAC.ID AS ACHIEVEMENT_COMPLETE_ID, TMA.ID AS MEMBER_ACHIEVEMENT_ID, TA.ACHIEVEMENT_SCHEDULE_CATEGORY AS ACHIEVEMENT_SCHEDULE_CATEGORY, TA.ACHIEVEMENT_IMG_PATH AS ACHIEVEMENT_IMG_PATH, TA.ACHIEVEMENT_IMG_NAME AS ACHIEVEMENT_IMG_NAME, TA.ACHIEVEMENT_GET_POINT AS ACHIEVEMENT_GET_POINT, TA.ACHIEVEMENT_MISSION_COUNT AS ACHIEVEMENT_MISSION_COUNT, TAC.ACHIEVEMENT_CURRENT_MISSION_COUNT AS ACHIEVEMENT_CURRENT_MISSION_COUNT, TMA.MEMBER_ACHIEVEMENT_DISPLAY AS MEMBER_ACHIEVEMENT_DISPLAY FROM TBL_ACHIEVEMENT TA JOIN HR.TBL_ACHIEVEMENT_COMPLETE TAC ON TA.ID = TAC.ACHIEVEMENT_ID JOIN HR.TBL_MEMBER_ACHIEVEMENT TMA ON TAC.ID = TMA.ACHIEVEMENT_COMPLETE_ID WHERE TMA.MEMBER_ID = #{id} AND TMA.MEMBER_ACHIEVEMENT_DISPLAY = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_ACHIEVEMENT SET ACHIEVEMENT_NAME = #{achievementName}, ACHIEVEMENT_SCHEDULE_CATEGORY = #{achievementScheduleCategory}, ACHIEVEMENT_IMG_PATH = #{achievementImgPath}, ACHIEVEMENT_IMG_NAME = #{achievementImgName}, ACHIEVEMENT_MISSION_COUNT = #{achievementMissionCount}, ACHIEVEMENT_GET_POINT = #{achievementGetPoint} WHERE ID = #{id}
